original_text: So I was afraid of you. I went and I buried your gold coins in the ground. Look! Here they are. You can have your money back again.”
korean_text: 두려워하여 나가서 당신의 달란트를 땅에 감추어 두었었나이다 보소서 당신의 것을 가지셨나이다

sentences.original_text: So I was afraid of you.
and I buried your gold coins in the ground.
You can have your money back again.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 돈을 다시 받을 수 있습니다.
